6 hours ago, spacebrick3 said:

I'm not sure what you mean. Are you saying that you should need a pilot or SAS to have gimbals?

On reaction wheels, you can set it to three modes, normal, sas only and pilot only.  Orbitalbuzzsaw is suggesting this apply to engines as well

13 hours ago, spacebrick3 said:

I'm not sure what you mean. Are you saying that you should need a pilot or SAS to have gimbals?

To explain the Reaction Wheel settings for you: SAS Only sets the reaction wheels to only operate for SAS input, Pilot Only sets it to only respond to Pilot (Player input). This way you can have RW for those "Oh crap" manual control moments, or for the inverse, have fine control manual but very aggressive SAS. Also it probably helps not to have all you wheels spinning away when you don't actually need them.
